name: Garbage Collector (GreyGhost)
description:
None of these rogue programs can exist for more than 1 minute,

Clean up the virtual machine before its too late!

----------

WASD / Left Stick - Movement

Mouse / Right Stick - Aim

Space / A - Jump

Left Click / RT - Shoot

Right Click / LT - Super Shot (costs 100 energy)

Shift / L3 - Sprint

Use Super Shot to break through enemy shields and/or launch yourself :D

----------

Accessibility Options

Aim Bot

Toggleable Retro Filter
